plant_disease.name: apple apple scab
plant_disease.symptoms: Olive-green to brown spots on leaves and fruit. Scabby lesions may form.
plant_disease.management: Use fungicides and remove fallen leaves. Improve air circulation.

plant_disease.name: apple black rot
plant_disease.symptoms: Dark spots on leaves and sunken black lesions on fruit.
plant_disease.management: Prune infected branches and apply fungicides during bloom.

plant_disease.name: apple cedar apple rust
plant_disease.symptoms: Orange-red spots on leaves and fruit.
plant_disease.management: Remove nearby cedar hosts. Use rust-resistant varieties.

plant_disease.name: apple healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: No disease symptoms. Healthy green leaves and fruit.
plant_disease.management: Maintain regular care. Monitor regularly.

plant_disease.name: blueberry healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: No symptoms observed. Leaves and berries look healthy.
plant_disease.management: Continue general maintenance and pest monitoring.

plant_disease.name: cherry including sour powdery mildew
plant_disease.symptoms: White powdery growth on leaf surfaces.
plant_disease.management: Use sulfur-based fungicides. Ensure good air circulation.

plant_disease.name: cherry including sour healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: Healthy leaves and fruit with no visible symptoms.
plant_disease.management: Apply standard pruning and fertilization practices.

plant_disease.name: corn maize cercospora leaf spot gray leaf spot
plant_disease.symptoms: Narrow, rectangular gray lesions on leaves.
plant_disease.management: Rotate crops. Use resistant hybrids and fungicides.

plant_disease.name: corn maize common rust
plant_disease.symptoms: Reddish-brown pustules on leaves.
plant_disease.management: Apply fungicides if severe. Use resistant corn varieties.

plant_disease.name: corn maize northern leaf blight
plant_disease.symptoms: Long, elliptical gray-green lesions on leaves.
plant_disease.management: Plant resistant hybrids. Apply fungicides if needed.

plant_disease.name: corn maize healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: Normal green foliage and uniform growth.
plant_disease.management: Monitor for pests. Use proper fertilization.

plant_disease.name: grape black rot
plant_disease.symptoms: Dark leaf spots and black shriveled fruit.
plant_disease.management: Apply fungicides. Remove infected plant parts.

plant_disease.name: grape esca black measles
plant_disease.symptoms: Tiger-striping on leaves, dark sunken lesions on fruit.
plant_disease.management: Remove infected vines. Limit pruning wounds.

plant_disease.name: grape leaf blight isariopsis leaf spot
plant_disease.symptoms: Irregular brown leaf spots with yellow halos.
plant_disease.management: Use proper pruning. Apply protective fungicides.

plant_disease.name: grape healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: No signs of disease. Healthy foliage and fruit.
plant_disease.management: Standard vineyard maintenance and monitoring.

plant_disease.name: orange haunglongbing citrus greening
plant_disease.symptoms: Yellowing of leaves, lopsided bitter fruit.
plant_disease.management: Control psyllid vector. Remove infected trees.

plant_disease.name: peach bacterial spot
plant_disease.symptoms: Small dark spots on leaves and fruit.
plant_disease.management: Use resistant varieties. Apply copper sprays.

plant_disease.name: peach healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: Healthy leaves and fruit with no signs of disease.
plant_disease.management: Continue normal orchard practices.

plant_disease.name: pepper bell bacterial spot
plant_disease.symptoms: Dark spots on leaves and fruits with water-soaked margins.
plant_disease.management: Use certified seeds. Apply copper-based bactericides.

plant_disease.name: pepper bell healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: No visible disease. Strong, green pepper plants.
plant_disease.management: Maintain good spacing and irrigation practices.

plant_disease.name: potato early blight
plant_disease.symptoms: Dark target-like spots on older leaves.
plant_disease.management: Apply fungicides. Rotate crops and remove debris.

plant_disease.name: potato late blight
plant_disease.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions and white mold on leaf undersides.
plant_disease.management: Apply fungicides preventively. Remove infected plants.

plant_disease.name: potato healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: Normal green foliage and tuber development.
plant_disease.management: Standard field care and disease monitoring.

plant_disease.name: raspberry healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: No leaf discoloration or fruit damage.
plant_disease.management: Continue general care and pest inspection.

plant_disease.name: soybean healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: Uniform growth, no signs of disease.
plant_disease.management: Maintain balanced nutrition and monitor regularly.

plant_disease.name: squash powdery mildew
plant_disease.symptoms: White powdery patches on leaves and stems.
plant_disease.management: Apply sulfur or neem oil. Increase spacing.

plant_disease.name: strawberry leaf scorch
plant_disease.symptoms: Dark blotches on leaves with scorched appearance.
plant_disease.management: Use disease-free plants. Remove infected leaves.

plant_disease.name: strawberry healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: Bright green leaves and red berries.
plant_disease.management: Apply fertilizers and inspect for pests regularly.

plant_disease.name: tomato bacterial spot
plant_disease.symptoms: Small water-soaked spots with yellow halos.
plant_disease.management: Use resistant seeds. Apply copper sprays.

plant_disease.name: tomato early blight
plant_disease.symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings and leaf drop.
plant_disease.management: Apply fungicides. Remove infected leaves.

plant_disease.name: tomato late blight
plant_disease.symptoms: Gray lesions and white fuzz on leaves and stems.
plant_disease.management: Apply protective fungicides. Remove infected plants.

plant_disease.name: tomato leaf mold
plant_disease.symptoms: Yellow leaf spots and fuzzy mold underneath.
plant_disease.management: Ensure air flow and apply fungicides as needed.

plant_disease.name: tomato septoria leaf spot
plant_disease.symptoms: Small circular brown spots with gray centers.
plant_disease.management: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides.

plant_disease.name: tomato spider mites two spotted spider mite
plant_disease.symptoms: Yellow stippling and fine webbing on leaves.
plant_disease.management: Spray insecticidal soap. Increase humidity.

plant_disease.name: tomato target spot
plant_disease.symptoms: Large concentric ring spots on leaves and fruit.
plant_disease.management: Use fungicides and remove affected foliage.

plant_disease.name: tomato yellow leaf curl virus
plant_disease.symptoms: Curling yellow leaves and stunted growth.
plant_disease.management: Control whiteflies. Remove infected plants.

plant_disease.name: tomato mosaic virus
plant_disease.symptoms: Mottled leaves with light and dark green areas.
plant_disease.management: Avoid handling plants when wet. Destroy infected material.

plant_disease.name: tomato healthy
plant_disease.symptoms: Deep green leaves and normal fruiting.
plant_disease.management: Monitor regularly and provide balanced nutrition.

plant_disease.name: background
plant_disease.symptoms: No plant detected. This is likely background or non-plant image.
plant_disease.management: Please upload a clear image of a plant leaf.
